Posts.Content: My sister has being diagnosed with breast cancer, she is currently undergoing chemotherapy and is on the 2nd course of 6 prior to surgery and radiotherapy.  She has 4 children ranging from 10 to 18 (the eldest has special needs). I wondered what support is out there for these children, whether there is any respite for them for a few days thank you for your help with this
Posts.Title: Is there any respite care offered for children and young people who...

Posts.Content: Hi Jo Thank you for your reply, my sister lives in Bristol.  i will ring Macmillan tomorrow, as much as we are all there for them, I think they are being brave and would benefit in confiding with people of their own age going through the same thing.  Thank you again

Posts.Content: Hi Helen thank you for your reply, I wil look into this. The children are putting on a brave face and  I am concerned they are so trying so hard not to upset anyone else that they aren’t addressing how they are feeling and need people their own age  to confide in thank you for replying  mandy
